title: Eliminate a Variable
text: The equations are already in standard form. To get opposite coefficients of y, multiply the first equation by 2. (3*x-y=-7)*2 $$4x+2y=-6$$

title: Solve for x
text: y will be eliminated and then solve for x. $$10x=-20$$ $$x=-2$$

title: Substitute and Solve for y
text: Substitute $$x=-2$$ into one of the original equations and solve for y. $$3\left(-2\right)-y=-7$$ $$-6-y=-7$$ $$y=1$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is (-2,1).
